config.dimensioncakes.disableNetherPorta: Disable the creation of Nether Portals
config.dimensioncakes.cakesStartEmpty: Do cakes start empty and need to be filled
config.dimensioncakes.endCakeRefill: Item that will refill End Cake ie: minecraft:apple
config.dimensioncakes.netherCakeRefill: Item that will refill the Nether Cake ie: minecraft:apple
config.dimensioncakes.overworldCakeRefil: Item that will refill the Overworld Cake ie: minecraft:apple
